SEARCH
Package main.interfaces

Interface InterfaceInvoker

All Known Implementing Classes:
Invoker, InvokerCacheDecorator, InvokerChronometerDecorator
public interface InterfaceInvoker
Interface representing an invoker that can perform actions.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Gets the ID of the invoker.
      Returns:
      The ID of the invoker.

    • setId

      void setId(String id)
      Sets the ID of the invoker.
      Parameters:
      id - The new ID to be set.

    • getActions

      ArrayList<Action> getActions()
      Gets the list of actions associated with the invoker.
      Returns:
      The list of actions.

    • setAction

      boolean setAction(Action action) throws InsufficientMemoryException
      Sets an action for execution by the invoker.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the action is set successfully, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      InsufficientMemoryException - If there is insufficient memory to add the action.

    • getTotalMemory

      double getTotalMemory()
      Gets the total memory available to the invoker.
      Returns:
      The total memory.

    • setTotalMemory

      void setTotalMemory(double totalMemory)
      Sets the total memory available to the invoker.
      Parameters:
      totalMemory - The new total memory to be set.

    • releaseMemory

      void releaseMemory(double memoryReleased)
      Releases a specified amount of memory.
      Parameters:
      memoryReleased - The amount of memory to be released.

    • executeInvokerActions

      ArrayList<ActionResult> executeInvokerActions() throws InsufficientMemoryException
      Executes the actions associated with the invoker and returns the results.
      Returns:
      A list of ActionResults.
      Throws:
      InsufficientMemoryException - If there is insufficient memory to execute the actions.

    • executeThisAction

      ActionResult executeThisAction(Action foundAction)
      Executes a specific action and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      foundAction - The action to be executed.
      Returns:
      The result of the executed action.

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(Observer observer)
      Adds an observer to the list of observers.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to be added.

    • getObservers

      ArrayList<Observer> getObservers()
      Gets the list of observers associated with the invoker.
      Returns:
      The list of observers.

    • removeObserver

      void removeObserver(Observer observer)
      Removes an observer from the list of observers.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to be removed.

    • notifyObservers

      void notifyObservers(ArrayList<Metric> metrics)
      Notifies the observers with the specified metrics.
      Parameters:
      metrics - The metrics to be sent to the observers.

    • getCache

      ConcurrentHashMap<String,ActionResult> getCache()
      Gets the cache associated with the invoker.
      Returns:
      The cache.

    • executeInvokerActionsAsync

      List<Future<ActionResult>> executeInvokerActionsAsync()
      Executes the actions associated with the invoker asynchronously.
      Returns:
      The list of futures representing the asynchronous execution of actions.

    • waitForFutures

      void waitForFutures(List<Future<ActionResult>> futures) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException
      Waits for the completion of the specified futures.
      Parameters:
      futures - The list of futures to wait for.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the waiting is interrupted.
      ExecutionException - If an execution exception occurs.

    • shutdownExecutorService

      void shutdownExecutorService()
      Shuts down the executor service associated with the invoker.
